short_summary: Fortinet training setup for this fiscal year
description: The procurement aims to deliver Fortinet training sessions in both English and French with 2 additional options, ensuring ICT accessibility without creating new technological barriers.

full_summary:
# Request for Information

## Solicitation Title
Fortinet Training Procurement Process

## Government Tender Details

* **Amendment number:** 5
* **Solicitation number:** R-141685
* **Publication date:** April 21, 2023
* **Tender closing date:** May 8, 2023 at 14:00
* **Amendment date:** May 8, 2023
* **Status:** Expired
* **Procurement category:** SRV

* **Procurement method:** Competitive - traditional
* **Gsin/ UNSPSC information:**
	+ UNSPSC: 43233200
	+ UNSPSC description: Security and protection software
* **Procurement location:**

	+ Region of delivery: Canada

## TDS Notice Information 
* **Notice Url:** N/A
* **Attachments:**
	+ English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4968/r-141685-ssc-rfi-frortinet-training-en.pdf>
	+ French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4968/r-141685-ssc-rfi-fortinet-training-fr.pdf>
	

# Procurement Objectives 

 The procurement objectives are to deliver 
 instructor-led in-class or virtual training sessions on Fortinet training for this fiscal year. The 
 sessions must be offered in both official languages and in an accessible format. Another objective is 
 to remove and not create new technological barriers to Information and Communications Technology 
( ICT) accessibility. The Contractor must provide facilities for the in-class training in the National 
Capital Region (NCR) and deliver the virtual training via Microsoft Teams.

The training should be in-class or virtual and be provided in both English and French.  There will be a minimum of 2 additional options required.
